tgt_original: 此性清潔，至竟無垢故；

src_original: anātmā tad gotram ātmanaḥ parigaveṣyamāṇanupalaṃbhāt /
tgt_original: 此性非我，求我不可得故；

src_original:  105 adhyātmaṃ kāśyapa parimargatha mā bahir vidhāvadhvaṃ / tat kasmād
tgt_original: 此性潔白，至竟淨故。 「汝等，迦葉！ 當應求內，反去求外。

src_original: 5 dhetoḥ bhaviṣyanti kāśyapa anāgate 'dhvani bhikṣavaḥ śvaloṣṭvānujavanasadṛśāḥ kathaṃ ca kāśyapa bhikṣavaḥ śvaloṣṭvānujavanasadṛśā
tgt_original: 當來之世，當有比丘馳走如犬。 云何比丘馳走如犬？

src_original: 1 bhavati / tadyathāpi nāma kāśyapa śvāno loṣṭunā trāsitaḥ tam eva loṣṭu-r-anudhāvati /  na tam anudhāvati /  2 yena sa loṣṭuṃ kṣiptaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 譬如有犬搏擲令怖，反走逐之不趣擲者。
